column1: <LI>The statistical search allows you to retrieve entries from the
Gazetteer on the basis of certain vital statistics
Choose the feature and the associated statistic you wish to use from the list below
and then you have the option of choosing a lower and an upper limit for that statistic.
<OPTION VALUE="G2-86"> Archdiocese and Diocese : Area (sq. km)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-6"> Business Park or Centre : Opened    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G2-6"> Business Park or Centre : Area (ha)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-41"> Golf Course or Club : Opened    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G2-41"> Golf Course or Club : Length (yards)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G2-81"> Harbour : Cargo Handled per Year (tonnes)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-23"> Learned Society or Academy : Established    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-84"> Oil or Gas Facility : Opened    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G2-84"> Oil or Gas Facility : Closed    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-85"> Other Industrial or Commercial Site : Opened    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-38"> Sea Loch or Inlet : Length (km)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G2-38"> Sea Loch or Inlet : Width (km)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-91"> Sports or Leisure Complex : Opened    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G1-56"> Walking Route or Way : Length (km)    </OPTION>
<OPTION VALUE="G2-56"> Walking Route or Way : Opened    </OPTION>
<LI>Select the council areas you want to include in your search.
You can choose 'All of Scotland' to include all council areas.
(This choice has no effect for 'people' and 'event' statistics).
<LI>Click on the button below to start your search.

The Editors of The Gazetteer for Scotland
